text: wkdhalk abtla allah taealaa bed eibadih bibaed btbayn hzwzhm min alarzaq walakhlaq, fajaeal bedhm ghnyana wbedhm fqyrana, wbedhm qwyana wbedhm deyfana, fahwj bedhm 'iilaa bed akhtbarana minh lahum bdhlk; lyqwl alkafirun alaghnya': ahwla' aldueafa' mann allah ealayhim balhdayt 'iilaa al'iislam min bynna? 'alays allah taealaa bi'aelam biman yashkurun nemth, fywfqhm 'iilaa alhdayt ldynh?
